titles.title: To modify and extend the temporary reduction of duty on Isoxaflutole.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/24/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily provide for the duty treatment of isoxaflutole.
